scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run package:dev && npm run deploy:packaged:dev
scripts.deploy:packaged:dev: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --s3-bucket case-consulting-sam-deployments-dev --s3-prefix mysterio-dev --stack-name mysterio-dev --parameter-overrides Stage=dev
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && npm run package:test && npm run deploy:packaged:test
scripts.deploy:packaged:test: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --s3-bucket case-consulting-sam-deployments-dev --s3-prefix mysterio-test --stack-name mysterio-test --parameter-overrides Stage=test
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run package:prod && npm run deploy:packaged:prod
scripts.deploy:packaged:prod: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --s3-bucket case-consulting-sam-deployments-prod --s3-prefix mysterio-prod --stack-name mysterio-prod --parameter-overrides Stage=prod --profile prod
scripts.local:basecamp-token: npm run build && sam local invoke BasecampTokenFunction -e basecamp-token/event.json
scripts.package:dev: sam package --region us-east-1 --s3-bucket case-consulting-sam-deployments-dev --s3-prefix mysterio-dev --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.package:test: sam package --region us-east-1 --s3-bucket case-consulting-sam-deployments-dev --s3-prefix mysterio-test --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.package:prod: sam package --region us-east-1 --s3-bucket case-consulting-sam-deployments-prod --s3-prefix mysterio-prod --output-template-file packaged.yaml --profile prod
scripts.reinstall:layers: (cd layers/dependencies/nodejs && npm install && npm ci) && (cd layers/shared/nodejs && npm install && npm ci)
